Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=20 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 8530 (MIC=40 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus MT 166 (MIC=20 µg/ml).Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas putida NCIM 2102 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=50 µg/ml).Fungi:Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 8530 (MIC=100 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.11031261] It exhibits no hemolytic activity up to a concentration of 200 μg/ml against rat erythrocytes.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Also has antifungal activity against C. albicans.

Literature.Title: Tigerinins novel antimicrobial peptides from the Indian frog Rana tigerina.
Literature.Author: Sai KP, Jagannadham MV, Vairamani M, Raju NP, Devi AS, Nagaraj R, Sitaram N.
